meta.name: Life Warm
meta.description: 温暖生活风格，米色暖橙配色，适合生活分享、美食攻略

base.container: background-color: #fffaf0; color: #4a4a4a; font-family: 'PingFang SC', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8; padding: 20px;

header_window.style: background-color: #fff; border: 2px solid #ff8c42; border-radius: 16px 16px 0 0; padding: 16px 24px; margin-bottom: 24px; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255, 140, 66, 0.15);

headings.h2: background-color: #ff8c42; color: #ffffff; padding: 12px 20px; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 24px 0 16px; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255, 140, 66, 0.25);
headings.h3: color: #ff8c42; font-size: 17px; font-weight: bold; margin: 20px 0 12px; padding-left: 16px; border-left: 5px solid #ffd4a3;
headings.h1: background-color: #ff8c42; color: #ffffff; padding: 12px 20px; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 24px 0 16px; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255, 140, 66, 0.25);
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #fff5eb; color: #4a4a4a; padding: 16px; border-radius: 12px; margin: 16px 0; border: 2px dashed #ffcc80;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #fff9e6; border: 2px solid #ffcc80; color: #d35400; padding: 14px 18px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 12px;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #ffe8e8; border: 2px solid #ffb3b3; color: #c0392b; padding: 14px 18px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 12px;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #ffcc80, transparent); margin: 32px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #fff9e6; border: 3px dashed #ffcc80; color: #ff8c42; padding: 24px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 16px; font-size: 14px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 40px; padding: 20px; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 16px; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255, 140, 66, 0.1);

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
